amendment.description: An amendment to insert a new section related to a $500 million increase in Clean Water State Revolving Fun and tax matters.

action.text: Mr. Taylor (NC) raised a point of order against the Obey amendment (A009). Mr. Taylor (NC) raised a point of order against the Obey amendment stating that it made changes in existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
